div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

description.value: Community health workers provide health education, referral and follow-up; case management and basic preventive health care; and home visiting services to specific communities. They provide support and assistance to clients by reminding clients to take their vaccinations, responding to emergencies, and reporting births.

name.value: ConceptMap to and from IMMZ.C DataElements

description.value: Mapping to and from IMMZ.C Data Dictionary to other codesystems.

name.value: ConceptMap to and From IMMZ.C sex to administrative gender

description.value: Mapping to and from IMMZ.C sex coding to FHIR Administrative Gender.

name.value: ConceptMap to and from IMMZ.D1 DataElements

description.value: Mapping to and from IMMZ.D1 Data Dictionary to other codesystems.

name.value: ConceptMap to and from IMMZ.D4 DataElements

description.value: Mapping to and from IMMZ.D4 Data Dictionary to other codesystems.

Responsible for: developing annual and multi-annual plans; immunization communication and mobilization; management of logistics, the cold chain, and vaccines; monitoring, supervision and evaluation of immunization services; and coordination of EPI activities at the national and subnational levels.
Health workers facilitate education sessions, administers immunizations, provide counselling when needed, record stock movements, and compiles/generates reports.
